SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.card

Class NonObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.card.NonObjectiveCard
public class NonObjectiveCard extends Card
Creates objects used to represent Gold, Resource, and Start cards.

      Stores the type of resource displayed on the corner of the card.

    • bottomLeftBack

      private final CornerType bottomLeftBack
      Stores the type of resource displayed on the corner of the card.

    • bottomRightBack

      private final CornerType bottomRightBack
      Stores the type of resource displayed on the corner of the card.

    • permRes

      private final int[] permRes
      Permanent resources present on the back of the card. Index of each resource dictated by ObjectType enum. Gold and Resource cards always have 1 permanent resource according to their kingdom, while start cards may have more.

    • conditionCount

      private final int[] conditionCount
      Resources that need to be present on the field before the card can be played. Index of each resource dictated by ObjectType enum.

    • kingdom

      private final ObjectType kingdom
      Kingdom (colour) the card belongs to.

  • Constructor Details

    • NonObjectiveCard

      public NonObjectiveCard(int id, int value, PointStrategy pointStrategy, CornerType topLeft, CornerType topRight, CornerType bottomLeft, CornerType bottomRight, CornerType topLeftBack, CornerType topRightBack, CornerType bottomLeftBack, CornerType bottomRightBack, int[] permRes, int[] conditionCount, ObjectType kingdom)
      Constructor of NonObjectiveCard object
      Parameters:
      id - ID of card
      value - Value of card used for calculating points (number found on top of card)
      pointStrategy - Strategy for calculating card points
      topLeft - Top left corner object
      topRight - Top right corner object
      bottomLeft - Bottom left corner object
      bottomRight - Bottom right corner object
      topLeftBack - Top left corner object at the back
      topRightBack - Top right corner object at the back
      bottomLeftBack - Bottom left corner object at the back
      bottomRightBack - Bottom right corner object at the back
      permRes - Permanent resources at the back of the card
      conditionCount - Resources needed to place the card
      kingdom - Kingdom the card belongs to
